fields.message_fr: The CHW %s with phone number %s has not sent in a report in over 15 days.
fields.message_en: The CHW %s with phone number %s has not sent in a report in over 15 days.
fields.message_kw: Umujyanama w'ubuzima %s ukoresha telefoni %s amaze iminsi 15 atohereza ubutumwa
fields.name: Inactive Reporter

fields.message_fr: La date d'accouchement du patient %s est arrivée.
fields.message_en: The gestational period of the patient %s is over; the labour should begin soon.
fields.message_kw: Itariki yo kubyara y'umubyeyi %s yageze.
fields.name: Due Date

fields.message_fr: La date d'accouché du patient %s arriva il y a une semaine.
fields.message_en: The patient %s is one week past the due date.
fields.message_kw: Itariki yo kujya kubyarira kwa muganga y'umubyeyi %s irenzeho icyumweru.
fields.name: Week After Due Date

fields.message_fr: Nous aimerions vous rapeler de nous envoyer les details sur la vie du patient (%s) et son enfant apres l'accouchement du (%s)
fields.message_en: We would like to remind you informing us about the life of patient (%s) and child, after delivering on (%s).
fields.message_kw: Twabibutsaga kutumenyesha uko ubuzima bw'umwana n'umubyeyi (%s) uko bwifashe nyuma yo kwibaruka tariki(%s).

fields.message_fr: Vous avez envoye %d raports ce mois. Nous vous remercions votre franche contribution pour renforcer la sante de la femme et son enfant.
fields.message_en: You have made %d reports this month, keep of good work. You are ensuring healthy children and mothers in Rwanda.
fields.message_kw: Mwatwohereje ubutumwa %d uku kwezi, turabashimira inkunga yanyu mu kubungabunga ubuzima bw'umwana n'umubyeyi. Mukomerezaho!
fields.name: Active Reporter Feedback

fields.message_fr: Nous aimerions vous rapeller qu'il fait sans recevoir, de vous, les raports sur la  sante de la femme et l'enfant!
fields.message_en: You haven't sen in any reports this month, please try harder to be deligent.
fields.message_kw: Nta butumwa bwanyu ku buzima bw'umwana n'umubyeyi duheruka. Mugerageze mudufashe kubungabunga ubuzima.
fields.name: Inactive Reporter Feedback

fields.message_fr: Rappel pour une intevention recu par le patient %s qui avait des complications.

fields.message_kw: Twabibutsaga kohereza ubutumwa ku butabazi bwakorewe umubyeyi %s wari wagize ibibazo. Murakoze
